content: This is where discussion will take place for January 10-12, 2022 Connectathon 29.

On behalf of the Multiple Chronic Care (MCC) eCare Team, and Care Planning track leads @Dave Carlson and @Emma Jones, we want to invite care planning and clinical practice guidelines stakeholders to participate in the Care Planning Track which will evaluate and explore goal-oriented care planning. We will be holding a Track Orientation call on January 5, 2022 at 10 - 11 am CT.

To receive a meeting invite for the Orientation call and to participate in the Care Planning track, please sign up here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/Connectathon+Track+Participation+Sign+Up

Care Planning Track Page in Confluence can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+Care+Planning

Once again reporting my Intro here. Dinesh Ganesan, Acarin (Digital Health Consulting Company). We provide a digital care management platform for care providers to create a personalized care-plan, engage with patients using a companion mobile app, and continuously monitor it using a real-time AI based monitor app. I would like to learn FHIR & care plan management as part of this connectathon.

Gravity Project's presentation to PACIO on 12/15/21 by Dan Vreeman (then Gravity Technical Director): https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/86977192/2021%2012%2014%20-%20PACIO-Gravity%20Collaboration%20Meeting.pptx?version=1&modificationDate=1639605058843&api=v2
The audio portion to go with the slides above is found at: https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/86977192/2021-12-15-audio1569264241.m4a?version=1&modificationDate=1639603369607&api=v2

VHA is VA Directive Publication #1310 "Medical Management of Enrolled Veterans Receiving Self-Directed Care for External Health Care Providers" Oct 4, 2021. Gives their definition of Care Management, Case Management, Coordination of Care, etc. Available for download at: https://www.va.gov/vhapublications/ViewPublication.asp?pub_ID=9461
